categories: Category:Battles of the Mandalorian Crusades during the Great Sith War

nodes.text: A battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Mandalorian Crusaders, was fought in 3996 BBY. At Contruum, the two sides fought with the Mandalorian emerging as the victors.
The battle was referenced in The Essential Atlas. It only illustrates the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose.
